attributes.action: Abolish the fixed term parliament act 2011
attributes.additional_details: This act removes the publics right to call for or demand by general election the removal of an incompetent government. The removal of this act will restore the publics right to remove this power from the cabinets no confidence vote and return the vote to the public. It is important to the nation that Government becomes more accountable to the population. We call upon both the attorney generals office and government to remove this unfair act within the life of this government.
